00087 /************************* state testing ************************/
00088 
00089 int ED_uvedit_test(Object *obedit)
00090 {
00091     BMEditMesh *em;
00092     int ret;
00093 
00094     if (!obedit)
00095         return 0;
00096     
00097     if (obedit->type != OB_MESH)
00098         return 0;
00099 
00100     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00101     ret = EDBM_mtexpoly_check(em);
00102     
00103     return ret;
00104 }

00106 static int ED_operator_uvedit_can_uv_sculpt(struct bContext *C)
00107 {
00108     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
00109     ToolSettings *toolsettings = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00110     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00111 
00112     return ED_space_image_show_uvedit(sima, obedit) && !(toolsettings->use_uv_sculpt);
00113 }
00114 
00115 static int UNUSED_FUNCTION(ED_operator_uvmap_mesh) (bContext * C)
00116 {
00117     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00118 
00119     if (ob && ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00120         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00121 
00122         if (CustomData_get_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MTFACE) != NULL)
00123             return 1;
00124     }
00125 
00126     return 0;
00127 }
00128 /**************************** object active image *****************************/
00129 
00130 static int is_image_texture_node(bNode *node)
00131 {
00132     return ELEM(node->type, SH_NODE_TEX_IMAGE, SH_NODE_TEX_ENVIRONMENT);
00133 }
00134 
00135 int ED_object_get_active_image(Object *ob, int mat_nr, Image **ima, ImageUser **iuser, bNode **node_r)
00136 {
00137     Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, mat_nr);
00138     bNode *node = (ma && ma->use_nodes) ? nodeGetActiveTexture(ma->nodetree) : NULL;
00139 
00140     if (node && is_image_texture_node(node)) {
00141         if (ima) *ima = (Image *)node->id;
00142         if (iuser) *iuser = NULL;
00143         if (node_r) *node_r = node;
00144         return TRUE;
00145     }
00146     
00147     if (ima) *ima = NULL;
00148     if (iuser) *iuser = NULL;
00149     if (node_r) *node_r = node;
00150 
00151     return FALSE;
00152 }
00153 
00154 void ED_object_assign_active_image(Main *bmain, Object *ob, int mat_nr, Image *ima)
00155 {
00156     Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, mat_nr);
00157     bNode *node = (ma && ma->use_nodes) ? nodeGetActiveTexture(ma->nodetree) : NULL;
00158 
00159     if (node && is_image_texture_node(node)) {
00160         node->id = &ima->id;
00161         ED_node_generic_update(bmain, ma->nodetree, node);
00162     }
00163 }

00165 /************************* assign image ************************/
00166 
00167 void ED_uvedit_assign_image(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Image *ima, Image *previma)
00168 {
00169     BMEditMesh *em;
00170     BMFace *efa;
00171     BMIter iter;
00172     MTexPoly *tf;
00173     int update = 0;
00174     
00175     /* skip assigning these procedural images... */
00176     if (ima && (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT || ima->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE))
00177         return;
00178 
00179     /* verify we have a mesh we can work with */
00180     if (!obedit || (obedit->type != OB_MESH))
00181         return;
00182 
00183     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00184     if (!em || !em->bm->totface) {
00185         return;
00186     }
00187 
00188     if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene)) {
00189         /* new shading system, assign image in material */
00190         int sloppy = 1;
00191         BMFace *efa = BM_active_face_get(em->bm, sloppy);
00192 
00193         if (efa)
00194             ED_object_assign_active_image(bmain, obedit, efa->mat_nr + 1, ima);
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         /* old shading system, assign image to selected faces */
00198         
00199         /* ensure we have a uv map */
00200         if (!CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY)) {
00201             BM_data_layer_add(em->bm, &em->bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00202             BM_data_layer_add(em->bm, &em->bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPUV);
00203             update = 1;
00204         }
00205 
00206         /* now assign to all visible faces */
00207         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00208             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00209 
00210             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, previma, efa, tf)) {
00211                 if (ima) {
00212                     tf->tpage = ima;
00213                     
00214                     if (ima->id.us == 0) id_us_plus(&ima->id);
00215                     else id_lib_extern(&ima->id);
00216                 }
00217                 else {
00218                     tf->tpage = NULL;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 update = 1;
00222             }
00223         }
00224 
00225         /* and update depdency graph */
00226         if (update)
00227             DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
00228     }
00229 
00230 }
00231 
00232 /* dotile - 1, set the tile flag (from the space image)
00233  *          2, set the tile index for the faces. */
00234 static int uvedit_set_tile(Object *obedit, Image *ima, int curtile)
00235 {
00236     BMEditMesh *em;
00237     BMFace *efa;
00238     BMIter iter;
00239     MTexPoly *tf;
00240     
00241     /* verify if we have something to do */
00242     if (!ima || !ED_uvedit_test(obedit))
00243         return 0;
00244 
00245     if ((ima->tpageflag & IMA_TILES) == 0)
00246         return 0;
00247 
00248     /* skip assigning these procedural images... */
00249     if (ima->type == IMA_TYPE_R_RESULT || ima->type == IMA_TYPE_COMPOSITE)
00250         return 0;
00251     
00252     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00253 
00254     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00255         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00256 
00257         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
00258             tf->tile = curtile;  /* set tile index */
00259     }
00260 
00261     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
00262 
00263     return 1;
00264 }

00266 /*********************** space conversion *********************/
00267 
00268 static void uvedit_pixel_to_float(SpaceImage *sima, float *dist, float pixeldist)
00269 {
00270     int width, height;
00271 
00272     if (sima) {
00273         ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
00274     }
00275     else {
00276         width = 256;
00277         height = 256;
00278     }
00279 
00280     dist[0] = pixeldist / width;
00281     dist[1] = pixeldist / height;
00282 }

00284 /*************** visibility and selection utilities **************/
00285 
00286 int uvedit_face_visible_nolocal(Scene *scene, BMFace *efa)
00287 {
00288     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00289 
00290     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION)
00291         return (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) == 0);
00292     else
00293         return (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) == 0 && BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
00294 }
00295 
00296 int uvedit_face_visible_test(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMFace *efa, MTexPoly *tf)
00297 {
00298     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00299 
00300     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SHOW_SAME_IMAGE)
00301         return (tf->tpage == ima) ? uvedit_face_visible_nolocal(scene, efa) : 0;
00302     else
00303         return uvedit_face_visible_nolocal(scene, efa);
00304 }
00305 
00306 int uvedit_face_select_test(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, BMFace *efa)
00307 {
00308     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00309 
00310     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION)
00311         return (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT));
00312     else {
00313         BMLoop *l;
00314         MLoopUV *luv;
00315         BMIter liter;
00316 
00317         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00318             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00319             if (!(luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL))
00320                 return 0;
00321         }
00322 
00323         return 1;
00324     }
00325 }
00326 
00327 int uvedit_face_select_enable(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, BMFace *efa, const short do_history)
00328 {
00329     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00330 
00331     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00332         BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE);
00333         if (do_history) {
00334             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, (BMElem *)efa);
00335         }
00336     }
00337     else {
00338         BMLoop *l;
00339         MLoopUV *luv;
00340         BMIter liter;
00341 
00342         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00343             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00344             luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00345         }
00346 
00347         return 1;
00348     }
00349 
00350     return 0;
00351 }
00352 
00353 int uvedit_face_select_disable(Scene *scene, BMEditMesh *em, BMFace *efa)
00354 {
00355     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00356 
00357     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00358         BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, FALSE);
00359     }
00360     else {
00361         BMLoop *l;
00362         MLoopUV *luv;
00363         BMIter liter;
00364 
00365         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00366             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00367             luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00368         }
00369 
00370         return 1;
00371     }
00372 
00373     return 0;
00374 }
00375 
00376 int uvedit_edge_select_test(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l)
00377 {
00378     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00379 
00380     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00381         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
00382             return BM_elem_flag_test(l->f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00383         }
00384         else if (ts->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00385             return BM_elem_flag_test(l->e, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00386         }
00387         else {
00388             return BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && 
00389                    BM_elem_flag_test(l->next->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00390         }
00391     }
00392     else {
00393         MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2;
00394 
00395         luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00396         luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00397 
00398         return (luv1->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL) && (luv2->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL);
00399     }
00400 }
00401 
00402 void uvedit_edge_select_enable(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l, const short do_history)
00403 
00404 {
00405     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00406 
00407     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00408         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00409             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, l->f, TRUE);
00410         else if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
00411             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, l->e, TRUE);
00412         else {
00413             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->e->v1, TRUE);
00414             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->e->v2, TRUE);
00415         }
00416 
00417         if (do_history) {
00418             BM_select_history_store(em->bm, (BMElem *)l->e);
00419         }
00420     }
00421     else {
00422         MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2;
00423 
00424         luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00425         luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00426         
00427         luv1->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00428         luv2->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00429     }
00430 }
00431 
00432 void uvedit_edge_select_disable(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l)
00433 
00434 {
00435     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00436 
00437     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00438         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00439             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, l->f, FALSE);
00440         else if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
00441             BM_edge_select_set(em->bm, l->e, FALSE);
00442         else {
00443             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->e->v1, FALSE);
00444             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->e->v2, FALSE);
00445         }
00446     }
00447     else {
00448         MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2;
00449 
00450         luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00451         luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00452         
00453         luv1->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00454         luv2->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00455     }
00456 }

00458 int uvedit_uv_select_test(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l)
00459 {
00460     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00461 
00462     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00463         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00464             return BM_elem_flag_test(l->f, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00465         else
00466             return BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
00467     }
00468     else {
00469         MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00470 
00471         return luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00472     }
00473 }
00474 
00475 void uvedit_uv_select_enable(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l, const short do_history)
00476 {
00477     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00478 
00479     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00480         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00481             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, l->f, TRUE);
00482         else
00483             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->v, TRUE);
00484 
00485         if (do_history) {
00486             BM_select_history_remove(em->bm, (BMElem *)l->v);
00487         }
00488     }
00489     else {
00490         MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00491         
00492         luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00493     }
00494 }
00495 
00496 void uvedit_uv_select_disable(BMEditMesh *em, Scene *scene, BMLoop *l)
00497 {
00498     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00499 
00500     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
00501         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
00502             BM_face_select_set(em->bm, l->f, FALSE);
00503         else
00504             BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->v, FALSE);
00505     }
00506     else {
00507         MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00508         
00509         luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
00510     }
00511 }

00513 /*********************** live unwrap utilities ***********************/
00514 
00515 void uvedit_live_unwrap_update(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
00516 {
00517     if (sima && (sima->flag & SI_LIVE_UNWRAP)) {
00518         ED_uvedit_live_unwrap_begin(scene, obedit);
00519         ED_uvedit_live_unwrap_re_solve();
00520         ED_uvedit_live_unwrap_end(0);
00521     }
00522 }

00524 /*********************** geometric utilities ***********************/
00525 void poly_uv_center(BMEditMesh *em, BMFace *f, float cent[2])
00526 {
00527     BMLoop *l;
00528     MLoopUV *luv;
00529     BMIter liter;
00530 
00531     zero_v2(cent);
00532 
00533     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00534         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00535         add_v2_v2(cent, luv->uv);
00536     }
00537 
00538     mul_v2_fl(cent, 1.0f / (float)f->len);
00539 }
00540 
00541 
00542 void uv_center(float uv[][2], float cent[2], int quad)
00543 {
00544     if (quad) {
00545         cent[0] = (uv[0][0] + uv[1][0] + uv[2][0] + uv[3][0]) / 4.0f;
00546         cent[1] = (uv[0][1] + uv[1][1] + uv[2][1] + uv[3][1]) / 4.0f;
00547     }
00548     else {
00549         cent[0] = (uv[0][0] + uv[1][0] + uv[2][0]) / 3.0f;
00550         cent[1] = (uv[0][1] + uv[1][1] + uv[2][1]) / 3.0f;
00551     }
00552 }
00553 
00554 float uv_area(float uv[][2], int quad)
00555 {
00556     if (quad)
00557         return area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]) + area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[2], uv[3]); 
00558     else
00559         return area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]); 
00560 }
00561 
00562 float poly_uv_area(float uv[][2], int len)
00563 {
00564     //BMESH_TODO: make this not suck
00565     //maybe use scanfill? I dunno.
00566 
00567     if (len >= 4)
00568         return area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]) + area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[2], uv[3]); 
00569     else
00570         return area_tri_v2(uv[0], uv[1], uv[2]); 
00571 
00572     return 1.0;
00573 }
00574 
00575 void poly_copy_aspect(float uv_orig[][2], float uv[][2], float aspx, float aspy, int len)
00576 {
00577     int i;
00578     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00579         uv[i][0] = uv_orig[i][0] * aspx;
00580         uv[i][1] = uv_orig[i][1] * aspy;
00581     }
00582 }
00583 
00584 int ED_uvedit_minmax(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit, float *min, float *max)
00585 {
00586     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00587     BMFace *efa;
00588     BMLoop *l;
00589     BMIter iter, liter;
00590     MTexPoly *tf;
00591     MLoopUV *luv;
00592     int sel;
00593 
00594     INIT_MINMAX2(min, max);
00595 
00596     sel = 0;
00597     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00598         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00599         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00600             continue;
00601         
00602         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00603             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
00604                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00605                 DO_MINMAX2(luv->uv, min, max); 
00606                 sel = 1;
00607             }
00608         }
00609     }
00610 
00611     return sel;
00612 }
00613 
00614 static int ED_uvedit_median(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit, float co[2])
00615 {
00616     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00617     BMFace *efa;
00618     BMLoop *l;
00619     BMIter iter, liter;
00620     MTexPoly *tf;
00621     MLoopUV *luv;
00622     unsigned int sel = 0;
00623 
00624     zero_v2(co);
00625     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00626         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00627         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00628             continue;
00629         
00630         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00631             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00632             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
00633                 add_v2_v2(co, luv->uv);
00634                 sel++;
00635             }
00636         }
00637     }
00638 
00639     mul_v2_fl(co, 1.0f / (float)sel);
00640 
00641     return (sel != 0);
00642 }
00643 
00644 static int uvedit_center(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit, float cent[2], char mode)
00645 {
00646     int change = FALSE;
00647     
00648     if (mode == V3D_CENTER) {  /* bounding box */
00649         float min[2], max[2];
00650         if (ED_uvedit_minmax(scene, ima, obedit, min, max)) {
00651             mid_v2_v2v2(cent, min, max);
00652             change = TRUE;
00653         }
00654     }
00655     else {
00656         if (ED_uvedit_median(scene, ima, obedit, cent)) {
00657             change = TRUE;
00658         }
00659     }
00660 
00661     return change;
00662 }
00663 
00664 /************************** find nearest ****************************/
00665 
00666 void uv_find_nearest_edge(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, float co[2], NearestHit *hit)
00667 {
00668     MTexPoly *tf;
00669     BMFace *efa;
00670     BMLoop *l;
00671     BMIter iter, liter;
00672     MLoopUV *luv, *nextluv;
00673     float mindist, dist;
00674     int i;
00675 
00676     mindist = 1e10f;
00677     memset(hit, 0, sizeof(*hit));
00678 
00679     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT);
00680     
00681     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00682         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00683         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00684             continue;
00685         
00686         i = 0;
00687         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00688             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00689             nextluv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00690 
00691             dist = dist_to_line_segment_v2(co, luv->uv, nextluv->uv);
00692 
00693             if (dist < mindist) {
00694                 hit->tf = tf;
00695                 hit->efa = efa;
00696                 
00697                 hit->l = l;
00698                 hit->nextl = l->next;
00699                 hit->luv = luv;
00700                 hit->nextluv = nextluv;
00701                 hit->lindex = i;
00702                 hit->vert1 = BM_elem_index_get(hit->l->v);
00703                 hit->vert2 = BM_elem_index_get(hit->l->next->v);
00704 
00705                 mindist = dist;
00706             }
00707 
00708             i++;
00709         }
00710     }
00711 }
00712 
00713 static void find_nearest_uv_face(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, float co[2], NearestHit *hit)
00714 {
00715     MTexPoly *tf;
00716     BMFace *efa;
00717     BMLoop *l;
00718     BMIter iter, liter;
00719     MLoopUV *luv;
00720     float mindist, dist, cent[2];
00721 
00722     mindist = 1e10f;
00723     memset(hit, 0, sizeof(*hit));
00724 
00725     /*this will fill in hit.vert1 and hit.vert2*/
00726     uv_find_nearest_edge(scene, ima, em, co, hit);
00727     hit->l = hit->nextl = NULL;
00728     hit->luv = hit->nextluv = NULL;
00729 
00730     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00731         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00732         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00733             continue;
00734         
00735         cent[0] = cent[1] = 0.0f;
00736         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00737             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00738 
00739             add_v2_v2(cent, luv->uv);
00740         }
00741 
00742         cent[0] /= efa->len;
00743         cent[1] /= efa->len;
00744         dist = fabs(co[0] - cent[0]) + fabs(co[1] - cent[1]);
00745 
00746         if (dist < mindist) {
00747             hit->tf = tf;
00748             hit->efa = efa;
00749             mindist = dist;
00750         }
00751     }
00752 }
00753 
00754 static int nearest_uv_between(BMEditMesh *em, BMFace *efa, int UNUSED(nverts), int id,
00755                               float co[2], float uv[2])
00756 {
00757     BMLoop *l;
00758     MLoopUV *luv;
00759     BMIter iter;
00760     float m[3], v1[3], v2[3], c1, c2, *uv1, /* *uv2, */ /* UNUSED */ *uv3;
00761     int id1, id2, i;
00762 
00763     id1 = (id + efa->len - 1) % efa->len;
00764     id2 = (id + efa->len + 1) % efa->len;
00765 
00766     m[0] = co[0] - uv[0];
00767     m[1] = co[1] - uv[1];
00768 
00769     i = 0;
00770     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00771         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00772         
00773         if (i == id1)
00774             uv1 = luv->uv;
00775         else if (i == id)
00776             ;  /* uv2 = luv->uv; */ /* UNUSED */
00777         else if (i == id2)
00778             uv3 = luv->uv;
00779 
00780         i++;
00781     }
00782 
00783     sub_v3_v3v3(v1, uv1, uv);
00784     sub_v3_v3v3(v2, uv3, uv);
00785 
00786     /* m and v2 on same side of v-v1? */
00787     c1 = v1[0] * m[1] - v1[1] * m[0];
00788     c2 = v1[0] * v2[1] - v1[1] * v2[0];
00789 
00790     if (c1 * c2 < 0.0f)
00791         return 0;
00792 
00793     /* m and v1 on same side of v-v2? */
00794     c1 = v2[0] * m[1] - v2[1] * m[0];
00795     c2 = v2[0] * v1[1] - v2[1] * v1[0];
00796 
00797     return (c1 * c2 >= 0.0f);
00798 }
00799 
00800 void uv_find_nearest_vert(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em,
00801                           float co[2], float penalty[2], NearestHit *hit)
00802 {
00803     BMFace *efa;
00804     BMLoop *l;
00805     BMIter iter, liter;
00806     MTexPoly *tf;
00807     MLoopUV *luv;
00808     float mindist, dist;
00809     int i;
00810 
00811     /*this will fill in hit.vert1 and hit.vert2*/
00812     uv_find_nearest_edge(scene, ima, em, co, hit);
00813     hit->l = hit->nextl = NULL;
00814     hit->luv = hit->nextluv = NULL;
00815 
00816     mindist = 1e10f;
00817     memset(hit, 0, sizeof(*hit));
00818     
00819     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT);
00820 
00821     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00822         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00823         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00824             continue;
00825         
00826         i = 0;
00827         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00828             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00829 
00830             if (penalty && uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l))
00831                 dist = fabs(co[0] - luv->uv[0]) + penalty[0] + fabs(co[1] - luv->uv[1]) + penalty[1];
00832             else
00833                 dist = fabs(co[0] - luv->uv[0]) + fabs(co[1] - luv->uv[1]);
00834 
00835             if (dist <= mindist) {
00836                 if (dist == mindist)
00837                     if (!nearest_uv_between(em, efa, efa->len, i, co, luv->uv)) {
00838                         i++;
00839                         continue;
00840                     }
00841 
00842                 mindist = dist;
00843 
00844                 hit->l = l;
00845                 hit->nextl = l->next;
00846                 hit->luv = luv;
00847                 hit->nextluv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00848                 hit->tf = tf;
00849                 hit->efa = efa;
00850                 hit->lindex = i;
00851                 hit->vert1 = BM_elem_index_get(hit->l->v);
00852             }
00853 
00854             i++;
00855         }
00856     }
00857 }
00858 
00859 int ED_uvedit_nearest_uv(Scene *scene, Object *obedit, Image *ima, float co[2], float uv[2])
00860 {
00861     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00862     BMFace *efa;
00863     BMLoop *l;
00864     BMIter iter, liter;
00865     MTexPoly *tf;
00866     MLoopUV *luv;
00867     float mindist, dist;
00868     int found = 0;
00869 
00870     mindist = 1e10f;
00871     uv[0] = co[0];
00872     uv[1] = co[1];
00873     
00874     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00875         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00876         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
00877             continue;
00878         
00879         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00880             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00881             dist = fabs(co[0] - luv->uv[0]) + fabs(co[1] - luv->uv[1]);
00882 
00883             if (dist <= mindist) {
00884                 mindist = dist;
00885 
00886                 uv[0] = luv->uv[0];
00887                 uv[1] = luv->uv[1];
00888                 found = 1;
00889             }
00890         }
00891     }
00892 
00893     return found;
00894 }
00895 
00896 UvElement *ED_uv_element_get(UvElementMap *map, BMFace *efa, BMLoop *l)
00897 {
00898     UvElement *element;
00899 
00900     element = map->vert[BM_elem_index_get(l->v)];
00901 
00902     for (; element; element = element->next)
00903         if (element->face == efa)
00904             return element;
00905 
00906     return NULL;
00907 }
00908 
00909 /*********************** loop select ***********************/
00910 
00911 static void select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_loop_flag(UvMapVert *first)
00912 {
00913     UvMapVert *iterv;
00914     int count = 0;
00915 
00916     for (iterv = first; iterv; iterv = iterv->next) {
00917         if (iterv->separate && iterv != first)
00918             break;
00919 
00920         count++;
00921     }
00922     
00923     if (count < 5)
00924         first->flag = 1;
00925 }
00926 
00927 static UvMapVert *select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(UvVertMap *vmap, BMFace *efa, int a)
00928 {
00929     UvMapVert *iterv, *first;
00930     BMLoop *l;
00931 
00932     l = BM_iter_at_index(NULL, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa, a);
00933     first = EDBM_uv_vert_map_at_index(vmap,  BM_elem_index_get(l->v));
00934 
00935     for (iterv = first; iterv; iterv = iterv->next) {
00936         if (iterv->separate)
00937             first = iterv;
00938         if (iterv->f == BM_elem_index_get(efa))
00939             return first;
00940     }
00941     
00942     return NULL;
00943 }
00944 
00945 static int select_edgeloop_uv_edge_tag_faces(BMEditMesh *em, UvMapVert *first1, UvMapVert *first2, int *totface)
00946 {
00947     UvMapVert *iterv1, *iterv2;
00948     BMFace *efa;
00949     int tot = 0;
00950 
00951     /* count number of faces this edge has */
00952     for (iterv1 = first1; iterv1; iterv1 = iterv1->next) {
00953         if (iterv1->separate && iterv1 != first1)
00954             break;
00955 
00956         for (iterv2 = first2; iterv2; iterv2 = iterv2->next) {
00957             if (iterv2->separate && iterv2 != first2)
00958                 break;
00959 
00960             if (iterv1->f == iterv2->f) {
00961                 /* if face already tagged, don't do this edge */
00962                 efa = EDBM_face_at_index(em, iterv1->f);
00963                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG))
00964                     return 0;
00965 
00966                 tot++;
00967                 break;
00968             }
00969         }
00970     }
00971 
00972     if (*totface == 0) /* start edge */
00973         *totface = tot;
00974     else if (tot != *totface) /* check for same number of faces as start edge */
00975         return 0;
00976 
00977     /* tag the faces */
00978     for (iterv1 = first1; iterv1; iterv1 = iterv1->next) {
00979         if (iterv1->separate && iterv1 != first1)
00980             break;
00981 
00982         for (iterv2 = first2; iterv2; iterv2 = iterv2->next) {
00983             if (iterv2->separate && iterv2 != first2)
00984                 break;
00985 
00986             if (iterv1->f == iterv2->f) {
00987                 efa = EDBM_face_at_index(em, iterv1->f);
00988                 BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
00989                 break;
00990             }
00991         }
00992     }
00993 
00994     return 1;
00995 }
00996 
00997 static int select_edgeloop(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, NearestHit *hit,
00998                            float limit[2], const short extend)
00999 {
01000     BMFace *efa;
01001     BMIter iter, liter;
01002     BMLoop *l;
01003     MTexPoly *tf;
01004     UvVertMap *vmap;
01005     UvMapVert *iterv1, *iterv2;
01006     int a, looking, nverts, starttotf, select;
01007 
01008     /* setup */
01009     EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 0, 0, 1);
01010     vmap = EDBM_uv_vert_map_create(em, 0, 0, limit);
01011 
01012     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT | BM_FACE);
01013 
01014     if (!extend) {
01015         select_all_perform(scene, ima, em, SEL_DESELECT);
01016     }
01017 
01018     BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_all(em->bm, BM_FACE, BM_ELEM_TAG, FALSE);
01019 
01020     /* set flags for first face and verts */
01021     nverts = hit->efa->len;
01022     iterv1 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, hit->efa, hit->lindex);
01023     iterv2 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, hit->efa, (hit->lindex + 1) % nverts);
01024     select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_loop_flag(iterv1);
01025     select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_loop_flag(iterv2);
01026 
01027     starttotf = 0;
01028     select_edgeloop_uv_edge_tag_faces(em, iterv1, iterv2, &starttotf);
01029 
01030     /* sorry, first edge isn't even ok */
01031     if (iterv1->flag == 0 && iterv2->flag == 0) looking = 0;
01032     else looking = 1;
01033 
01034     /* iterate */
01035     while (looking) {
01036         looking = 0;
01037 
01038         /* find correct valence edges which are not tagged yet, but connect to tagged one */
01039 
01040         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01041             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01042 
01043             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG) && uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
01044                 nverts = efa->len;
01045                 for (a = 0; a < nverts; a++) {
01046                     /* check face not hidden and not tagged */
01047                     iterv1 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, efa, a);
01048                     iterv2 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, efa, (a + 1) % nverts);
01049                     
01050                     if (!iterv1 || !iterv2)
01051                         continue;
01052 
01053                     /* check if vertex is tagged and has right valence */
01054                     if (iterv1->flag || iterv2->flag) {
01055                         if (select_edgeloop_uv_edge_tag_faces(em, iterv1, iterv2, &starttotf)) {
01056                             looking = 1;
01057                             BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01058 
01059                             select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_loop_flag(iterv1);
01060                             select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_loop_flag(iterv2);
01061                             break;
01062                         }
01063                     }
01064                 }
01065             }
01066         }
01067     }
01068 
01069     /* do the actual select/deselect */
01070     nverts = hit->efa->len;
01071     iterv1 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, hit->efa, hit->lindex);
01072     iterv2 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, hit->efa, (hit->lindex + 1) % nverts);
01073     iterv1->flag = 1;
01074     iterv2->flag = 1;
01075 
01076     if (extend) {
01077         if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, hit->l))
01078             select = 0;
01079         else
01080             select = 1;
01081     }
01082     else
01083         select = 1;
01084     
01085     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01086         a = 0;
01087         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01088             iterv1 = select_edgeloop_uv_vertex_map_get(vmap, efa, a);
01089 
01090             if (iterv1->flag) {
01091                 if (select) uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
01092                 else uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
01093             }
01094 
01095             a++;
01096         }
01097     }
01098 
01099     /* cleanup */
01100     EDBM_uv_vert_map_free(vmap);
01101     EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
01102 
01103     return (select) ? 1 : -1;
01104 }
01105 
01106 /*********************** linked select ***********************/
01107 
01108 static void select_linked(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, float limit[2], NearestHit *hit, int extend)
01109 {
01110     BMFace *efa;
01111     BMLoop *l;
01112     BMIter iter, liter;
01113     MTexPoly *tf;
01114     MLoopUV *luv;
01115     UvVertMap *vmap;
01116     UvMapVert *vlist, *iterv, *startv;
01117     int i, stacksize = 0, *stack;
01118     unsigned int a;
01119     char *flag;
01120 
01121     EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 0, 0, 1); /* we can use this too */
01122     vmap = EDBM_uv_vert_map_create(em, 1, 1, limit);
01123 
01124     if (vmap == NULL)
01125         return;
01126 
01127     stack = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*stack) * (em->bm->totface + 1), "UvLinkStack");
01128     flag = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*flag) * em->bm->totface, "UvLinkFlag");
01129 
01130     if (!hit) {
01131         BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, a) {
01132             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01133 
01134             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
01135                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01136                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01137 
01138                     if (luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL) {
01139                         stack[stacksize] = a;
01140                         stacksize++;
01141                         flag[a] = 1;
01142 
01143                         break;
01144                     }
01145                 }
01146             }
01147         }
01148     }
01149     else {
01150         a = 0;
01151         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01152             if (efa == hit->efa) {
01153                 stack[stacksize] = a;
01154                 stacksize++;
01155                 flag[a] = 1;
01156                 break;
01157             }
01158 
01159             a++;
01160         }
01161     }
01162 
01163     while (stacksize > 0) {
01164         int j;
01165 
01166         stacksize--;
01167         a = stack[stacksize];
01168         
01169         j = 0;
01170         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01171             if (j == a)
01172                 break;
01173 
01174             j++;
01175         }
01176 
01177         i = 0;
01178         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01179 
01180             /* make_uv_vert_map_EM sets verts tmp.l to the indices */
01181             vlist = EDBM_uv_vert_map_at_index(vmap, BM_elem_index_get(l->v));
01182             
01183             startv = vlist;
01184 
01185             for (iterv = vlist; iterv; iterv = iterv->next) {
01186                 if (iterv->separate)
01187                     startv = iterv;
01188                 if (iterv->f == a)
01189                     break;
01190             }
01191 
01192             for (iterv = startv; iterv; iterv = iterv->next) {
01193                 if ((startv != iterv) && (iterv->separate))
01194                     break;
01195                 else if (!flag[iterv->f]) {
01196                     flag[iterv->f] = 1;
01197                     stack[stacksize] = iterv->f;
01198                     stacksize++;
01199                 }
01200             }
01201 
01202             i++;
01203         }
01204     }
01205 
01206     if (!extend) {
01207         a = 0;
01208         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01209             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01210                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01211                 
01212                 if (flag[a])
01213                     luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01214                 else
01215                     luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01216             }
01217             a++;
01218         }
01219     }
01220     else {
01221         a = 0;
01222         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01223             if (!flag[a]) {
01224                 a++;
01225                 continue;
01226             }
01227             
01228             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01229                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01230                         
01231                 if (luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL)
01232                     break;
01233             }
01234             
01235             if (l)
01236                 break;
01237             
01238             a++;
01239         }
01240 
01241         if (efa) {
01242             a = 0;
01243             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01244                 if (!flag[a]) {
01245                     a++;
01246                     continue;
01247                 }
01248 
01249                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01250                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01251                     
01252                     luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01253                 }
01254 
01255                 a++;
01256             }
01257         }
01258         else {
01259             a = 0;
01260             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01261                 if (!flag[a]) {
01262                     a++;
01263                     continue;
01264                 }
01265 
01266                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01267                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01268                     
01269                     luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01270                 }
01271 
01272                 a++;
01273             }
01274         }
01275     }
01276     
01277     MEM_freeN(stack);
01278     MEM_freeN(flag);
01279     EDBM_uv_vert_map_free(vmap);
01280     EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
01281 }
01282 
01283 /* WATCH IT: this returns first selected UV,
01284  * not ideal in many cases since there could be multiple */
01285 static float *uv_sel_co_from_eve(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, BMVert *eve)
01286 {
01287     BMIter liter;
01288     BMLoop *l;
01289 
01290     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, eve, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01291         MTexPoly *tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, l->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01292 
01293         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, l->f, tf))
01294             continue;
01295 
01296         if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01297             MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01298             return luv->uv;
01299         }
01300     }
01301 
01302     return NULL;
01303 }
01304 
01305 /* ******************** align operator **************** */
01306 
01307 static void weld_align_uv(bContext *C, int tool)
01308 {
01309     SpaceImage *sima;
01310     Scene *scene;
01311     Object *obedit;
01312     Image *ima;
01313     BMEditMesh *em;
01314     BMIter iter, liter;
01315     MTexPoly *tf;
01316     MLoopUV *luv;
01317     float cent[2], min[2], max[2];
01318     
01319     scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01320     obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01321     em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01322     ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
01323     sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
01324 
01325     INIT_MINMAX2(min, max);
01326 
01327     if (tool == 'a') {
01328         BMFace *efa;
01329         BMLoop *l;
01330 
01331         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01332             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01333 
01334             if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01335                 continue;
01336 
01337             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01338                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01339                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01340                     DO_MINMAX2(luv->uv, min, max);
01341                 }
01342             }
01343         }
01344 
01345         tool = (max[0] - min[0] >= max[1] - min[1]) ? 'y' : 'x';
01346     }
01347 
01348     uvedit_center(scene, ima, obedit, cent, 0);
01349 
01350     if (tool == 'x' || tool == 'w') {
01351         BMFace *efa;
01352         BMLoop *l;
01353 
01354         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01355             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01356             if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01357                 continue;
01358 
01359             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01360                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01361                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01362                     luv->uv[0] = cent[0];
01363                 }
01364 
01365             }
01366         }
01367     }
01368 
01369     if (tool == 'y' || tool == 'w') {
01370         BMFace *efa;
01371         BMLoop *l;
01372 
01373         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01374             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01375             if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01376                 continue;
01377 
01378             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01379                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01380                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01381                     luv->uv[1] = cent[1];
01382                 }
01383 
01384             }
01385         }
01386     }
01387 
01388     if (tool == 's' || tool == 't' || tool == 'u') {
01389         BMEdge *eed;
01390         BMLoop *l;
01391         BMVert *eve;
01392         BMVert *eve_start;
01393         BMIter iter, liter, eiter;
01394 
01395         /* clear tag */
01396         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01397             BM_elem_flag_disable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01398         }
01399 
01400         /* tag verts with a selected UV */
01401         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01402             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, eve, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01403                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, l->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01404 
01405                 if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, l->f, tf))
01406                     continue;
01407 
01408                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01409                     BM_elem_flag_enable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01410                     break;
01411                 }
01412             }
01413         }
01414 
01415         /* flush vertex tags to edges */
01416         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, em->bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01417             BM_elem_flag_set(eed, BM_ELEM_TAG, (BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v1, BM_ELEM_TAG) &&
01418                                                 BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v2, BM_ELEM_TAG)));
01419         }
01420 
01421         /* find a vertex with only one tagged edge */
01422         eve_start = NULL;
01423         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01424             int tot_eed_tag = 0;
01425             BM_ITER_ELEM (eed, &eiter, eve, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01426                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
01427                     tot_eed_tag++;
01428                 }
01429             }
01430 
01431             if (tot_eed_tag == 1) {
01432                 eve_start = eve;
01433                 break;
01434             }
01435         }
01436 
01437         if (eve_start) {
01438             BMVert **eve_line = NULL;
01439             BMVert *eve_next = NULL;
01440             BLI_array_declare(eve_line);
01441             int i;
01442 
01443             eve = eve_start;
01444 
01445             /* walk over edges, building an array of verts in a line */
01446             while (eve) {
01447                 BLI_array_append(eve_line, eve);
01448                 /* don't touch again */
01449                 BM_elem_flag_disable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
01450 
01451                 eve_next = NULL;
01452 
01453                 /* find next eve */
01454                 BM_ITER_ELEM (eed, &eiter, eve, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01455                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
01456                         BMVert *eve_other = BM_edge_other_vert(eed, eve);
01457                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve_other, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
01458                             /* this is a tagged vert we didnt walk over yet, step onto it */
01459                             eve_next = eve_other;
01460                             break;
01461                         }
01462                     }
01463                 }
01464 
01465                 eve = eve_next;
01466             }
01467 
01468             /* now we have all verts, make into a line */
01469             if (BLI_array_count(eve_line) > 2) {
01470 
01471                 /* we know the returns from these must be valid */
01472                 float *uv_start = uv_sel_co_from_eve(scene, ima, em, eve_line[0]);
01473                 float *uv_end   = uv_sel_co_from_eve(scene, ima, em, eve_line[BLI_array_count(eve_line) - 1]);
01474                 /* For t & u modes */
01475                 float a = 0.0f;
01476 
01477                 if (tool == 't') {
01478                     if (uv_start[1] == uv_end[1])
01479                         tool = 's';
01480                     else
01481                         a = (uv_end[0] - uv_start[0]) / (uv_end[1] - uv_start[1]);
01482                 }
01483                 else if (tool == 'u') {
01484                     if (uv_start[0] == uv_end[0])
01485                         tool = 's';
01486                     else
01487                         a = (uv_end[1] - uv_start[1]) / (uv_end[0] - uv_start[0]);
01488                 }
01489 
01490                 /* go over all verts except for endpoints */
01491                 for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(eve_line); i++) {
01492                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, eve_line[i], BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01493                         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, l->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01494 
01495                         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, l->f, tf))
01496                             continue;
01497 
01498                         if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
01499                             MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01500                             /* Projection of point (x, y) over line (x1, y1, x2, y2) along X axis:
01501                              * new_y = (y2 - y1) / (x2 - x1) * (x - x1) + y1
01502                              * Maybe this should be a BLI func? Or is it already existing?
01503                              * Could use interp_v2_v2v2, but not sure it's worth it here...*/
01504                             if (tool == 't')
01505                                 luv->uv[0] = a * (luv->uv[1] - uv_start[1]) + uv_start[0];
01506                             else if (tool == 'u')
01507                                 luv->uv[1] = a * (luv->uv[0] - uv_start[0]) + uv_start[1];
01508                             else
01509                                 closest_to_line_segment_v2(luv->uv, luv->uv, uv_start, uv_end);
01510                         }
01511                     }
01512                 }
01513             }
01514             else {
01515                 /* error - not a line, needs 3+ points  */
01516             }
01517 
01518             if (eve_line) {
01519                 MEM_freeN(eve_line);
01520             }
01521         }
01522         else {
01523             /* error - cant find an endpoint */
01524         }
01525     }
01526 
01527 
01528     uvedit_live_unwrap_update(sima, scene, obedit);
01529     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
01530     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
01531 }
01532 
01533 static int align_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01534 {
01535     weld_align_uv(C, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "axis"));
01536 
01537     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01538 }
01539 
01540 static void UV_OT_align(wmOperatorType *ot)
01541 {
01542     static EnumPropertyItem axis_items[] = {
01543         {'s', "ALIGN_S", 0, "Straighten", "Align UVs along the line defined by the endpoints"},
01544         {'t', "ALIGN_T", 0, "Straighten X", "Align UVs along the line defined by the endpoints along the X axis"},
01545         {'u', "ALIGN_U", 0, "Straighten Y", "Align UVs along the line defined by the endpoints along the Y axis"},
01546         {'a', "ALIGN_AUTO", 0, "Align Auto", "Automatically choose the axis on which there is most alignment already"},
01547         {'x', "ALIGN_X", 0, "Align X", "Align UVs on X axis"},
01548         {'y', "ALIGN_Y", 0, "Align Y", "Align UVs on Y axis"},
01549         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01550 
01551     /* identifiers */
01552     ot->name = "Align";
01553     ot->description = "Align selected UV vertices to an axis";
01554     ot->idname = "UV_OT_align";
01555     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01556     
01557     /* api callbacks */
01558     ot->exec = align_exec;
01559     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
01560 
01561     /* properties */
01562     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "axis", axis_items, 'a', "Axis", "Axis to align UV locations on");
01563 }
01564 
01565 /* ******************** weld operator **************** */
01566 
01567 static int weld_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01568 {
01569     weld_align_uv(C, 'w');
01570 
01571     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01572 }
01573 
01574 static void UV_OT_weld(wmOperatorType *ot)
01575 {
01576     /* identifiers */
01577     ot->name = "Weld";
01578     ot->description = "Weld selected UV vertices together";
01579     ot->idname = "UV_OT_weld";
01580     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01581     
01582     /* api callbacks */
01583     ot->exec = weld_exec;
01584     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
01585 }
01586 
01587 
01588 /* ******************** (de)select all operator **************** */
01589 
01590 static void select_all_perform(Scene *scene, Image *ima, BMEditMesh *em, int action)
01591 {
01592     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
01593     BMFace *efa;
01594     BMLoop *l;
01595     BMIter iter, liter;
01596     MTexPoly *tf;
01597     MLoopUV *luv;
01598 
01599     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
01600 
01601         switch (action) {
01602             case SEL_TOGGLE:
01603                 EDBM_select_toggle_all(em);
01604                 break;
01605             case SEL_SELECT:
01606                 EDBM_flag_enable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01607                 break;
01608             case SEL_DESELECT:
01609                 EDBM_flag_disable_all(em, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01610                 break;
01611             case SEL_INVERT:
01612                 EDBM_select_swap(em);
01613                 EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
01614                 break;
01615         }
01616     }
01617     else {
01618         if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
01619             action = SEL_SELECT;
01620             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01621                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01622     
01623                 if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01624                     continue;
01625 
01626                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01627                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01628 
01629                     if (luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL) {
01630                         action = SEL_DESELECT;
01631                         break;
01632                     }
01633                 }
01634             }
01635         }
01636     
01637         
01638         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01639             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01640 
01641             if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01642                 continue;
01643 
01644             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01645                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01646 
01647                 switch (action) {
01648                     case SEL_SELECT:
01649                         luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01650                         break;
01651                     case SEL_DESELECT:
01652                         luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01653                         break;
01654                     case SEL_INVERT:
01655                         luv->flag ^= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
01656                         break;
01657                 }
01658             }
01659         }
01660     }
01661 }
01662 
01663 static int select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01664 {
01665     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01666     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01667     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
01668     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01669 
01670     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01671 
01672     select_all_perform(scene, ima, em, action);
01673 
01674     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
01675 
01676     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01677 }
01678 
01679 static void UV_OT_select_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
01680 {
01681     /* identifiers */
01682     ot->name = "(De)select All";
01683     ot->description = "Change selection of all UV vertices";
01684     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_all";
01685     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
01686     
01687     /* api callbacks */
01688     ot->exec = select_all_exec;
01689     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
01690 
01691     WM_operator_properties_select_all(ot);
01692 }
01693 
01694 /* ******************** mouse select operator **************** */
01695 
01696 static int sticky_select(float *limit, int hitv[4], int v, float *hituv[4], float *uv, int sticky, int hitlen)
01697 {
01698     int i;
01699 
01700     /* this function test if some vertex needs to selected
01701      * in addition to the existing ones due to sticky select */
01702     if (sticky == SI_STICKY_DISABLE)
01703         return 0;
01704 
01705     for (i = 0; i < hitlen; i++) {
01706         if (hitv[i] == v) {
01707             if (sticky == SI_STICKY_LOC) {
01708                 if (fabsf(hituv[i][0] - uv[0]) < limit[0] && fabsf(hituv[i][1] - uv[1]) < limit[1])
01709                     return 1;
01710             }
01711             else if (sticky == SI_STICKY_VERTEX)
01712                 return 1;
01713         }
01714     }
01715 
01716     return 0;
01717 }
01718 
01719 static int mouse_select(bContext *C, float co[2], int extend, int loop)
01720 {
01721     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
01722     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01723     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
01724     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01725     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
01726     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
01727     BMFace *efa;
01728     BMLoop *l;
01729     BMIter iter, liter;
01730     MTexPoly *tf;
01731     MLoopUV *luv;
01732     NearestHit hit;
01733     int i, select = 1, selectmode, sticky, sync, *hitv = NULL;
01734     BLI_array_declare(hitv);
01735     int flush = 0, hitlen = 0; /* 0 == don't flush, 1 == sel, -1 == desel;  only use when selection sync is enabled */
01736     float limit[2], **hituv = NULL;
01737     BLI_array_declare(hituv);
01738     float penalty[2];
01739 
01740     /* notice 'limit' is the same no matter the zoom level, since this is like
01741      * remove doubles and could annoying if it joined points when zoomed out.
01742      * 'penalty' is in screen pixel space otherwise zooming in on a uv-vert and
01743      * shift-selecting can consider an adjacent point close enough to add to
01744      * the selection rather than de-selecting the closest. */
01745 
01746     uvedit_pixel_to_float(sima, limit, 0.05f);
01747     uvedit_pixel_to_float(sima, penalty, 5.0f / sima->zoom);
01748 
01749     /* retrieve operation mode */
01750     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
01751         sync = 1;
01752 
01753         if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)
01754             selectmode = UV_SELECT_FACE;
01755         else if (ts->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE)
01756             selectmode = UV_SELECT_EDGE;
01757         else
01758             selectmode = UV_SELECT_VERTEX;
01759 
01760         sticky = SI_STICKY_DISABLE;
01761     }
01762     else {
01763         sync = 0;
01764         selectmode = ts->uv_selectmode;
01765         sticky = (sima) ? sima->sticky : 1;
01766     }
01767 
01768     /* find nearest element */
01769     if (loop) {
01770         /* find edge */
01771         uv_find_nearest_edge(scene, ima, em, co, &hit);
01772         if (hit.efa == NULL) {
01773             BLI_array_free(hitv);
01774             BLI_array_free(hituv);
01775             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01776         }
01777 
01778         hitlen = 0;
01779     }
01780     else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01781         /* find vertex */
01782         uv_find_nearest_vert(scene, ima, em, co, penalty, &hit);
01783         if (hit.efa == NULL) {
01784             BLI_array_free(hitv);
01785             BLI_array_free(hituv);
01786             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01787         }
01788 
01789         /* mark 1 vertex as being hit */
01790         BLI_array_growitems(hitv, hit.efa->len);
01791         BLI_array_growitems(hituv, hit.efa->len);
01792         for (i = 0; i < hit.efa->len; i++) {
01793             hitv[i] = 0xFFFFFFFF;
01794         }
01795 
01796         hitv[hit.lindex] = hit.vert1;
01797         hituv[hit.lindex] = hit.luv->uv;
01798 
01799         hitlen = hit.efa->len;
01800     }
01801     else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_EDGE) {
01802         /* find edge */
01803         uv_find_nearest_edge(scene, ima, em, co, &hit);
01804         if (hit.efa == NULL) {
01805             BLI_array_free(hitv);
01806             BLI_array_free(hituv);
01807             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01808         }
01809 
01810         /* mark 2 edge vertices as being hit */
01811         BLI_array_growitems(hitv,  hit.efa->len);
01812         BLI_array_growitems(hituv, hit.efa->len);
01813         fill_vn_i(hitv, hit.efa->len, 0xFFFFFFFF);
01814 
01815         hitv[hit.lindex] = hit.vert1;
01816         hitv[(hit.lindex + 1) % hit.efa->len] = hit.vert2;
01817         hituv[hit.lindex] = hit.luv->uv;
01818         hituv[(hit.lindex + 1) % hit.efa->len] = hit.nextluv->uv;
01819 
01820         hitlen = hit.efa->len;
01821     }
01822     else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE) {
01823         /* find face */
01824         find_nearest_uv_face(scene, ima, em, co, &hit);
01825         if (hit.efa == NULL) {
01826             BLI_array_free(hitv);
01827             BLI_array_free(hituv);
01828             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01829         }
01830         
01831         /* make active */
01832         BM_active_face_set(em->bm, hit.efa);
01833 
01834         /* mark all face vertices as being hit */
01835 
01836         BLI_array_growitems(hitv,  hit.efa->len);
01837         BLI_array_growitems(hituv, hit.efa->len);
01838         i = 0;
01839         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, hit.efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01840             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01841             hituv[i] = luv->uv;
01842             hitv[i] = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
01843             i++;
01844         }
01845         
01846         hitlen = hit.efa->len;
01847     }
01848     else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_ISLAND) {
01849         uv_find_nearest_vert(scene, ima, em, co, NULL, &hit);
01850 
01851         if (hit.efa == NULL) {
01852             BLI_array_free(hitv);
01853             BLI_array_free(hituv);
01854             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01855         }
01856 
01857         hitlen = 0;
01858     }
01859     else {
01860         hitlen = 0;
01861         BLI_array_free(hitv);
01862         BLI_array_free(hituv);
01863         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01864     }
01865 
01866     /* do selection */
01867     if (loop) {
01868         flush = select_edgeloop(scene, ima, em, &hit, limit, extend);
01869     }
01870     else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_ISLAND) {
01871         select_linked(scene, ima, em, limit, &hit, extend);
01872     }
01873     else if (extend) {
01874         if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01875             /* (de)select uv vertex */
01876             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, hit.l)) {
01877                 uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, hit.l);
01878                 select = 0;
01879             }
01880             else {
01881                 uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, hit.l, TRUE);
01882                 select = 1;
01883             }
01884             flush = 1;
01885         }
01886         else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_EDGE) {
01887             /* (de)select edge */
01888             if (uvedit_edge_select_test(em, scene, hit.l)) {
01889                 uvedit_edge_select_disable(em, scene, hit.l);
01890                 select = 0;
01891             }
01892             else {
01893                 uvedit_edge_select_enable(em, scene, hit.l, TRUE);
01894                 select = 1;
01895             }
01896             flush = 1;
01897         }
01898         else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE) {
01899             /* (de)select face */
01900             if (uvedit_face_select_test(scene, em, hit.efa)) {
01901                 uvedit_face_select_disable(scene, em, hit.efa);
01902                 select = 0;
01903             }
01904             else {
01905                 uvedit_face_select_enable(scene, em, hit.efa, TRUE);
01906                 select = 1;
01907             }
01908             flush = -1;
01909         }
01910 
01911         /* de-selecting an edge may deselect a face too - validate */
01912         if (sync) {
01913             if (select == FALSE) {
01914                 BM_select_history_validate(em->bm);
01915             }
01916         }
01917 
01918         /* (de)select sticky uv nodes */
01919         if (sticky != SI_STICKY_DISABLE) {
01920 
01921             BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT);
01922 
01923             /* deselect */
01924             if (select == 0) {
01925                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01926                     tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01927                     if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01928                         continue;
01929 
01930                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01931                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01932                         if (sticky_select(limit, hitv, BM_elem_index_get(l->v), hituv, luv->uv, sticky, hitlen))
01933                             uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
01934                     }
01935                 }
01936                 flush = -1;
01937             }
01938             /* select */
01939             else {
01940                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01941                     tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01942                     if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01943                         continue;
01944 
01945                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01946                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01947                         if (sticky_select(limit, hitv, BM_elem_index_get(l->v), hituv, luv->uv, sticky, hitlen))
01948                             uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
01949                     }
01950                 }
01951 
01952                 flush = 1;
01953             }           
01954         }
01955     }
01956     else {
01957         /* deselect all */
01958         select_all_perform(scene, ima, em, SEL_DESELECT);
01959 
01960         if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_VERTEX) {
01961             /* select vertex */
01962             uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, hit.l, TRUE);
01963             flush = 1;
01964         }
01965         else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_EDGE) {
01966             /* select edge */
01967             uvedit_edge_select_enable(em, scene, hit.l, TRUE);
01968             flush = 1;
01969         }
01970         else if (selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE) {
01971             /* select face */
01972             uvedit_face_select_enable(scene, em, hit.efa, TRUE);
01973         }
01974 
01975         /* select sticky uvs */
01976         if (sticky != SI_STICKY_DISABLE) {
01977             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
01978                 tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01979                 if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
01980                     continue;
01981                 
01982                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01983                     if (sticky == SI_STICKY_DISABLE) continue;
01984                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
01985 
01986                     if (sticky_select(limit, hitv, BM_elem_index_get(l->v), hituv, luv->uv, sticky, hitlen))
01987                         uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
01988 
01989                     flush = 1;
01990                 }
01991             }
01992         }
01993     }
01994 
01995     if (sync) {
01996         /* flush for mesh selection */
01997 
01998         /* before bmesh */
01999 #if 0
02000         if (ts->selectmode != SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02001             if (flush == 1) EDBM_select_flush(em);
02002             else if (flush == -1) EDBM_deselect_flush(em);
02003         }
02004 #else
02005         if (flush != 0) {
02006             if (loop) {
02007                 /* push vertex -> edge selection */
02008                 if (select) {
02009                     EDBM_select_flush(em);
02010                 }
02011                 else {
02012                     EDBM_deselect_flush(em);
02013                 }
02014             }
02015             else {
02016                 EDBM_selectmode_flush(em);
02017             }
02018         }
02019 #endif
02020     }
02021 
02022     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
02023     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02024 
02025     BLI_array_free(hitv);
02026     BLI_array_free(hituv);
02027 
02028     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH | OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02029 }
02030 
02031 static int select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02032 {
02033     float co[2];
02034     int extend, loop;
02035 
02036     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02037     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02038     loop = 0;
02039 
02040     return mouse_select(C, co, extend, loop);
02041 }
02042 
02043 static int select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02044 {
02045     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02046     float co[2];
02047 
02048     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &co[0], &co[1]);
02049     RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02050 
02051     return select_exec(C, op);
02052 }
02053 
02054 static void UV_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
02055 {
02056     /* identifiers */
02057     ot->name = "Select";
02058     ot->description = "Select UV vertices";
02059     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select";
02060     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02061     
02062     /* api callbacks */
02063     ot->exec = select_exec;
02064     ot->invoke = select_invoke;
02065     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02066 
02067     /* properties */
02068     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
02069                     "Extend", "Extend selection rather than clearing the existing selection");
02070     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
02071                          "Location", "Mouse location in normalized coordinates, 0.0 to 1.0 is within the image bounds", -100.0f, 100.0f);
02072 }
02073 
02074 /* ******************** loop select operator **************** */
02075 
02076 static int select_loop_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02077 {
02078     float co[2];
02079     int extend, loop;
02080 
02081     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02082     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02083     loop = 1;
02084 
02085     return mouse_select(C, co, extend, loop);
02086 }
02087 
02088 static int select_loop_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02089 {
02090     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02091     float co[2];
02092 
02093     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &co[0], &co[1]);
02094     RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02095 
02096     return select_loop_exec(C, op);
02097 }
02098 
02099 static void UV_OT_select_loop(wmOperatorType *ot)
02100 {

02102     ot->name = "Loop Select";
02103     ot->description = "Select a loop of connected UV vertices";
02104     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_loop";
