02110     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02111 
02112     /* properties */
02113     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
02114                     "Extend", "Extend selection rather than clearing the existing selection");
02115     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
02116                          "Location", "Mouse location in normalized coordinates, 0.0 to 1.0 is within the image bounds", -100.0f, 100.0f);
02117 }
02118 
02119 /* ******************** linked select operator **************** */
02120 
02121 static int select_linked_internal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event, int pick)
02122 {
02123     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
02124     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02125     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02126     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02127     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02128     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02129     float limit[2];
02130     int extend;
02131 
02132     NearestHit hit, *hit_p = NULL;
02133 
02134     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
02135         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't select linked when sync selection is enabled");
02136         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02137     }
02138 
02139     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02140     uvedit_pixel_to_float(sima, limit, 0.05f);
02141 
02142     if (pick) {
02143         float co[2];
02144 
02145         if (event) {
02146             /* invoke */
02147             ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02148 
02149             UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &co[0], &co[1]);
02150             RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02151         }
02152         else {
02153             /* exec */
02154             RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", co);
02155         }
02156 
02157         uv_find_nearest_vert(scene, ima, em, co, NULL, &hit);
02158         hit_p = &hit;
02159     }
02160 
02161     select_linked(scene, ima, em, limit, hit_p, extend);
02162 
02163     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
02164     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02165 
02166     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02167 }
02168 
02169 static int select_linked_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02170 {
02171     return select_linked_internal(C, op, NULL, 0);
02172 }
02173 
02174 static void UV_OT_select_linked(wmOperatorType *ot)
02175 {
02176     /* identifiers */
02177     ot->name = "Select Linked";
02178     ot->description = "Select all UV vertices linked to the active UV map";
02179     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_linked";
02180     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02181     
02182     /* api callbacks */
02183     ot->exec = select_linked_exec;
02184     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active;    /* requires space image */
02185 
02186     /* properties */
02187     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
02188                     "Extend", "Extend selection rather than clearing the existing selection");
02189 }
02190 
02191 static int select_linked_pick_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02192 {
02193     return select_linked_internal(C, op, event, 1);
02194 }
02195 
02196 static int select_linked_pick_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02197 {
02198     return select_linked_internal(C, op, NULL, 1);
02199 }
02200 
02201 static void UV_OT_select_linked_pick(wmOperatorType *ot)
02202 {
02203     /* identifiers */
02204     ot->name = "Select Linked Pick";
02205     ot->description = "Select all UV vertices linked under the mouse";
02206     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_linked_pick";
02207     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02208 
02209     /* api callbacks */
02210     ot->invoke = select_linked_pick_invoke;
02211     ot->exec = select_linked_pick_exec;
02212     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02213 
02214     /* properties */
02215     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0,
02216                     "Extend", "Extend selection rather than clearing the existing selection");
02217 
02218     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
02219                          "Location", "Mouse location in normalized coordinates, 0.0 to 1.0 is within the image bounds", -100.0f, 100.0f);
02220 }
02221 
02222 /* ******************** unlink selection operator **************** */
02223 
02224 static int unlink_selection_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02225 {
02226     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02227     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02228     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02229     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02230     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02231     BMFace *efa;
02232     BMLoop *l;
02233     BMIter iter, liter;
02234     MTexPoly *tf;
02235     MLoopUV *luv;
02236 
02237     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
02238         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't unlink selection when sync selection is enabled");
02239         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02240     }
02241     
02242     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02243         int desel = 0;
02244 
02245         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02246         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
02247             continue;
02248 
02249         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02250             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02251             
02252             if (!(luv->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL)) {
02253                 desel = 1;
02254                 break;
02255             }
02256         }
02257 
02258         if (desel) {
02259             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02260                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02261                 luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
02262             }
02263         }
02264     }
02265     
02266     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
02267     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02268 
02269     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02270 }
02271 
02272 static void UV_OT_unlink_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)
02273 {
02274     /* identifiers */
02275     ot->name = "Unlink Selection";
02276     ot->description = "Unlink selected UV vertices from active UV map";
02277     ot->idname = "UV_OT_unlink_selected";
02278     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02279     
02280     /* api callbacks */
02281     ot->exec = unlink_selection_exec;
02282     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
02283 }
02284 
02285 /* ******************** border select operator **************** */
02286 
02287 /* This function sets the selection on tagged faces, need because settings the
02288  * selection a face is done in a number of places but it also needs to respect
02289  * the sticky modes for the UV verts, so dealing with the sticky modes is best
02290  * done in a separate function.
02291  * 
02292  * De-selects faces that have been tagged on efa->tmp.l.  */
02293 
02294 static void uv_faces_do_sticky(bContext *C, SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *obedit, short select)
02295 {
02296     /* Selecting UV Faces with some modes requires us to change 
02297      * the selection in other faces (depending on the sticky mode).
02298      * 
02299      * This only needs to be done when the Mesh is not used for
02300      * selection (so for sticky modes, vertex or location based). */
02301     
02302     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02303     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02304     BMFace *efa;
02305     BMLoop *l;
02306     BMIter iter, liter;
02307     /* MTexPoly *tf; */
02308     
02309     if ((ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) == 0 && sima->sticky == SI_STICKY_VERTEX) {
02310         /* Tag all verts as untouched, then touch the ones that have a face center
02311          * in the loop and select all MLoopUV's that use a touched vert. */
02312         BMVert *eve;
02313         
02314         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02315             BM_elem_flag_disable(eve, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02316         }
02317         
02318         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02319             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02320                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02321                     BM_elem_flag_enable(l->v, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02322                 }
02323             }
02324         }
02325 
02326         /* now select tagged verts */
02327         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02328             /* tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY); */ /* UNUSED */
02329 
02330             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02331                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02332                     if (select)
02333                         uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02334                     else
02335                         uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
02336                 }
02337             }
02338         }
02339     }
02340     else if ((ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) == 0 && sima->sticky == SI_STICKY_LOC) {
02341         BMFace *efa_vlist;
02342         /* MTexPoly *tf_vlist; */ /* UNUSED */
02343         UvMapVert *start_vlist = NULL, *vlist_iter;
02344         struct UvVertMap *vmap;
02345         float limit[2];
02346         unsigned int efa_index;
02347         //BMVert *eve; /* removed vert counting for now */ 
02348         //int a;
02349         
02350         uvedit_pixel_to_float(sima, limit, 0.05);
02351         
02352         EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 0, 0, 1);
02353         vmap = EDBM_uv_vert_map_create(em, 0, 0, limit);
02354         
02355         /* verts are numbered above in make_uv_vert_map_EM, make sure this stays true! */
02356         if (vmap == NULL) {
02357             return;
02358         }
02359         
02360         efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
02361         for (efa_index = 0; efa; efa = BM_iter_step(&iter), efa_index++) {
02362             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02363                 /* tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY); */ /* UNUSED */
02364                 
02365                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02366                     if (select)
02367                         uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02368                     else
02369                         uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
02370                     
02371                     vlist_iter = EDBM_uv_vert_map_at_index(vmap, BM_elem_index_get(l->v));
02372                     
02373                     while (vlist_iter) {
02374                         if (vlist_iter->separate)
02375                             start_vlist = vlist_iter;
02376                         
02377                         if (efa_index == vlist_iter->f)
02378                             break;
02379 
02380                         vlist_iter = vlist_iter->next;
02381                     }
02382                 
02383                     vlist_iter = start_vlist;
02384                     while (vlist_iter) {
02385                         
02386                         if (vlist_iter != start_vlist && vlist_iter->separate)
02387                             break;
02388                         
02389                         if (efa_index != vlist_iter->f) {
02390                             efa_vlist = EDBM_face_at_index(em, vlist_iter->f);
02391                             /* tf_vlist = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa_vlist->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY); */ /* UNUSED */
02392                             
02393                             if (select)
02394                                 uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, BM_iter_at_index(em->bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa_vlist, vlist_iter->tfindex), FALSE);
02395                             else
02396                                 uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, BM_iter_at_index(em->bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, efa_vlist, vlist_iter->tfindex));
02397                         }
02398                         vlist_iter = vlist_iter->next;
02399                     }
02400                 }
02401             }
02402         }
02403         EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
02404         EDBM_uv_vert_map_free(vmap);
02405         
02406     }
02407     else { /* SI_STICKY_DISABLE or ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION */
02408         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02409             if (BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {
02410                 if (select)
02411                     uvedit_face_select_enable(scene, em, efa, FALSE);
02412                 else
02413                     uvedit_face_select_disable(scene, em, efa);
02414             }
02415         }
02416     }
02417 }
02418 
02419 static int border_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02420 {
02421     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
02422     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02423     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02424     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02425     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02426     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02427     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02428     BMFace *efa;
02429     BMLoop *l;
02430     BMIter iter, liter;
02431     MTexPoly *tf;
02432     MLoopUV *luv;
02433     rcti rect;
02434     rctf rectf;
02435     int change, pinned, select, faces, extend;
02436 
02437     /* get rectangle from operator */
02438     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
02439     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
02440     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
02441     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
02442         
02443     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
02444     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
02445 
02446     /* figure out what to select/deselect */
02447     select = (RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode") == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
02448     pinned = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "pinned");
02449     extend = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
02450 
02451     if (!extend)
02452         select_all_perform(scene, ima, em, SEL_DESELECT);
02453     
02454     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION)
02455         faces = (ts->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE);
02456     else
02457         faces = (ts->uv_selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE);
02458 
02459     /* do actual selection */
02460     if (faces && !pinned) {
02461         /* handle face selection mode */
02462         float cent[2];
02463 
02464         change = 0;
02465 
02466         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02467             /* assume not touched */
02468             BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02469 
02470             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02471             if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
02472                 poly_uv_center(em, efa, cent);
02473                 if (BLI_in_rctf(&rectf, cent[0], cent[1])) {
02474                     BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02475                     change = 1;
02476                 }
02477             }
02478         }
02479 
02480         /* (de)selects all tagged faces and deals with sticky modes */
02481         if (change)
02482             uv_faces_do_sticky(C, sima, scene, obedit, select);
02483     }
02484     else {
02485         /* other selection modes */
02486         change = 1;
02487         
02488         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02489             tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02490             if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf))
02491                 continue;
02492             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02493                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02494 
02495                 if (!pinned || (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) ) {
02496 
02497                     /* UV_SYNC_SELECTION - can't do pinned selection */
02498                     if (BLI_in_rctf(&rectf, luv->uv[0], luv->uv[1])) {
02499                         if (select) uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02500                         else uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
02501                     }
02502                 }
02503                 else if (pinned) {
02504                     if ((luv->flag & MLOOPUV_PINNED) && 
02505                         BLI_in_rctf(&rectf, luv->uv[0], luv->uv[1])) {
02506                         if (select) uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02507                         else uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
02508                     }
02509                 }
02510             }
02511         }
02512     }
02513 
02514     if (change) {
02515         /* bmesh API habdles flushing but not on de-select */
02516         if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
02517             if (ts->selectmode != SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
02518                 if (select == FALSE) {
02519                     EDBM_deselect_flush(em);
02520                 }
02521             }
02522         }
02523 
02524         if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
02525             if (select == FALSE) {
02526                 BM_select_history_validate(em->bm);
02527             }
02528         }
02529 
02530         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02531         
02532         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02533     }
02534 
02535     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02536 } 
02537 
02538 static void UV_OT_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
02539 {
02540     /* identifiers */
02541     ot->name = "Border Select";
02542     ot->description = "Select UV vertices using border selection";
02543     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_border";
02544     
02545     /* api callbacks */
02546     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
02547     ot->exec = border_select_exec;
02548     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
02549     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02550     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
02551     
02552     /* flags */
02553     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02554     
02555     /* properties */
02556     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "pinned", 0, "Pinned", "Border select pinned UVs only");
02557 
02558     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
02559 }
02560 
02561 /* ******************** circle select operator **************** */
02562 
02563 static void select_uv_inside_ellipse(BMEditMesh *em, SpaceImage *UNUSED(sima), Scene *scene, int select,
02564                                      float *offset, float *ell, BMLoop *l, MLoopUV *luv)
02565 {
02566     /* normalized ellipse: ell[0] = scaleX, ell[1] = scaleY */
02567     float x, y, r2, *uv;
02568     
02569     
02570     uv = luv->uv;
02571 
02572     x = (uv[0] - offset[0]) * ell[0];
02573     y = (uv[1] - offset[1]) * ell[1];
02574 
02575     r2 = x * x + y * y;
02576     if (r2 < 1.0f) {
02577         if (select) uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02578         else uvedit_uv_select_disable(em, scene, l);
02579     }
02580 }
02581 
02582 static int circle_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02583 {
02584     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
02585     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02586     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02587     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02588     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02589     BMFace *efa;
02590     BMLoop *l;
02591     BMIter iter, liter;
02592     MLoopUV *luv;
02593     int x, y, radius, width, height, select;
02594     float zoomx, zoomy, offset[2], ellipse[2];
02595     int gesture_mode = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
02596 
02597     /* get operator properties */
02598     select = (gesture_mode == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT);
02599     x = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "x");
02600     y = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "y");
02601     radius = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "radius");
02602 
02603     /* compute ellipse size and location, not a circle since we deal
02604      * with non square image. ellipse is normalized, r = 1.0. */
02605     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
02606     ED_space_image_zoom(sima, ar, &zoomx, &zoomy);
02607 
02608     ellipse[0] = width * zoomx / radius;
02609     ellipse[1] = height * zoomy / radius;
02610 
02611     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, x, y, &offset[0], &offset[1]);
02612     
02613     /* do selection */
02614     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02615         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02616             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02617             select_uv_inside_ellipse(em, sima, scene, select, offset, ellipse, l, luv);
02618         }
02619     }
02620 
02621 #if 0 //I think the BM_elem_select_set api stuff handles all this as necessary?
02622     if (select) EM_select_flush(em);
02623     else EM_deselect_flush(em);
02624 #endif
02625     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02626 
02627     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02628 }
02629 
02630 static void UV_OT_circle_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
02631 {
02632     /* identifiers */
02633     ot->name = "Circle Select";
02634     ot->description = "Select UV vertices using circle selection";
02635     ot->idname = "UV_OT_circle_select";
02636     
02637     /* api callbacks */
02638     ot->invoke = WM_gesture_circle_invoke;
02639     ot->modal = WM_gesture_circle_modal;
02640     ot->exec = circle_select_exec;
02641     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02642     ot->cancel = WM_gesture_circle_cancel;
02643     
02644     /* flags */
02645     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02646     
02647     /* properties */
02648     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "x", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "X", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02649     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "y", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Y", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02650     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "radius", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Radius", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02651     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "gesture_mode", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Gesture Mode", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
02652 }
02653 
02654 /* ******************** snap cursor operator **************** */
02655 
02656 static void snap_uv_to_pixel(float *uvco, float w, float h)
02657 {
02658     uvco[0] = ((float)((int)((uvco[0] * w) + 0.5f))) / w;
02659     uvco[1] = ((float)((int)((uvco[1] * h) + 0.5f))) / h;
02660 }
02661 
02662 static void snap_cursor_to_pixels(SpaceImage *sima)
02663 {
02664     int width = 0, height = 0;
02665 
02666     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
02667     snap_uv_to_pixel(sima->cursor, width, height);
02668 }
02669 
02670 static int snap_cursor_to_selection(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit, SpaceImage *sima)
02671 {
02672     return uvedit_center(scene, ima, obedit, sima->cursor, sima->around);
02673 }
02674 
02675 static int snap_cursor_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02676 {
02677     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
02678     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02679     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02680     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02681     int change = 0;
02682 
02683     switch (RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "target")) {
02684         case 0:
02685             snap_cursor_to_pixels(sima);
02686             change = 1;
02687             break;
02688         case 1:
02689             change = snap_cursor_to_selection(scene, ima, obedit, sima);
02690             break;
02691     }
02692 
02693     if (!change)
02694         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02695     
02696     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_IMAGE, sima);
02697 
02698     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02699 }
02700 
02701 static void UV_OT_snap_cursor(wmOperatorType *ot)
02702 {
02703     static EnumPropertyItem target_items[] = {
02704         {0, "PIXELS", 0, "Pixels", ""},
02705         {1, "SELECTED", 0, "Selected", ""},
02706         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
02707 
02708     /* identifiers */
02709     ot->name = "Snap Cursor";
02710     ot->description = "Snap cursor to target type";
02711     ot->idname = "UV_OT_snap_cursor";
02712     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02713     
02714     /* api callbacks */
02715     ot->exec = snap_cursor_exec;
02716     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02717 
02718     /* properties */
02719     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "target", target_items, 0, "Target", "Target to snap the selected UVs to");
02720 }
02721 
02722 /* ******************** snap selection operator **************** */
02723 
02724 static int snap_uvs_to_cursor(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit, SpaceImage *sima)
02725 {
02726     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02727     BMFace *efa;
02728     BMLoop *l;
02729     BMIter iter, liter;
02730     MTexPoly *tface;
02731     MLoopUV *luv;
02732     short change = 0;
02733 
02734     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02735         tface = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02736         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tface))
02737             continue;
02738 
02739         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02740             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
02741                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02742                 copy_v2_v2(luv->uv, sima->cursor);
02743                 change = 1;
02744             }
02745         }
02746     }
02747 
02748     return change;
02749 }
02750 
02751 static int snap_uvs_to_adjacent_unselected(Scene *scene, Image *ima, Object *obedit)
02752 {
02753     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02754     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
02755     BMFace *f;
02756     BMLoop *l, *lsub;
02757     BMIter iter, liter, lsubiter;
02758     MTexPoly *tface;
02759     MLoopUV *luv;
02760     short change = FALSE;
02761     
02762     /* index every vert that has a selected UV using it, but only once so as to
02763      * get unique indices and to count how much to malloc */
02764     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02765         tface = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02766         if (uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, f, tface)) {
02767             BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02768             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02769                 BM_elem_flag_set(l, BM_ELEM_TAG, uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l));
02770             }
02771         }
02772         else {
02773             BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_TAG);
02774         }
02775     }
02776 
02777     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02778         if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {           /* face: visible */
02779             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02780                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(l, BM_ELEM_TAG)) {   /* loop: selected*/
02781                     float uv[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f};
02782                     int uv_tot = 0;
02783 
02784                     BM_ITER_ELEM (lsub, &lsubiter, l->v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
02785                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(lsub->f, BM_ELEM_TAG) && /* face: visible */
02786                             !BM_elem_flag_test(lsub, BM_ELEM_TAG))     /* loop: unselected  */
02787                         {
02788 
02789                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, lsub->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02790                             add_v2_v2(uv, luv->uv);
02791                             uv_tot++;
02792                         }
02793                     }
02794 
02795                     if (uv_tot) {
02796                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02797                         mul_v2_v2fl(luv->uv, uv, 1.0f / (float)uv_tot);
02798                         change = TRUE;
02799                     }
02800                 }
02801             }
02802         }
02803     }
02804 
02805     return change;
02806 }
02807 
02808 static int snap_uvs_to_pixels(SpaceImage *sima, Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
02809 {
02810     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02811     Image *ima = sima->image;
02812     BMFace *efa;
02813     BMLoop *l;
02814     BMIter iter, liter;
02815     MTexPoly *tface;
02816     MLoopUV *luv;
02817     int width = 0, height = 0;
02818     float w, h;
02819     short change = 0;
02820 
02821     ED_space_image_size(sima, &width, &height);
02822     w = (float)width;
02823     h = (float)height;
02824     
02825     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02826         tface = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02827         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tface))
02828             continue;
02829 
02830         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02831             if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l)) {
02832                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02833                 snap_uv_to_pixel(luv->uv, w, h);
02834             }
02835         }
02836 
02837         change = 1;
02838     }
02839 
02840     return change;
02841 }
02842 
02843 static int snap_selection_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02844 {
02845     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
02846     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02847     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02848     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02849     int change = 0;
02850 
02851     switch (RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "target")) {
02852         case 0:
02853             change = snap_uvs_to_pixels(sima, scene, obedit);
02854             break;
02855         case 1:
02856             change = snap_uvs_to_cursor(scene, ima, obedit, sima);
02857             break;
02858         case 2:
02859             change = snap_uvs_to_adjacent_unselected(scene, ima, obedit);
02860             break;
02861     }
02862 
02863     if (!change)
02864         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02865 
02866     uvedit_live_unwrap_update(sima, scene, obedit);
02867     DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
02868     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
02869 
02870     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02871 }
02872 
02873 static void UV_OT_snap_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)
02874 {
02875     static EnumPropertyItem target_items[] = {
02876         {0, "PIXELS", 0, "Pixels", ""},
02877         {1, "CURSOR", 0, "Cursor", ""},
02878         {2, "ADJACENT_UNSELECTED", 0, "Adjacent Unselected", ""},
02879         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
02880 
02881     /* identifiers */
02882     ot->name = "Snap Selection";
02883     ot->description = "Snap selected UV vertices to target type";
02884     ot->idname = "UV_OT_snap_selected";
02885     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02886     
02887     /* api callbacks */
02888     ot->exec = snap_selection_exec;
02889     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
02890 
02891     /* properties */
02892     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "target", target_items, 0, "Target", "Target to snap the selected UVs to");
02893 }
02894 
02895 /* ******************** pin operator **************** */
02896 
02897 static int pin_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02898 {
02899     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02900     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02901     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02902     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02903     BMFace *efa;
02904     BMLoop *l;
02905     BMIter iter, liter;
02906     MTexPoly *tface;
02907     MLoopUV *luv;
02908     int clear = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "clear");
02909     
02910     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02911         tface = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02912         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tface))
02913             continue;
02914 
02915         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02916             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02917             
02918             if (!clear) {
02919                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l))
02920                     luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_PINNED;
02921             }
02922             else {
02923                 if (uvedit_uv_select_test(em, scene, l))
02924                     luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_PINNED;
02925             }
02926         }
02927     }
02928     
02929     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
02930 
02931     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02932 }
02933 
02934 static void UV_OT_pin(wmOperatorType *ot)
02935 {
02936     /* identifiers */
02937     ot->name = "Pin";
02938     ot->description = "Set/clear selected UV vertices as anchored between multiple unwrap operations";
02939     ot->idname = "UV_OT_pin";
02940     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02941     
02942     /* api callbacks */
02943     ot->exec = pin_exec;
02944     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
02945 
02946     /* properties */
02947     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "clear", 0, "Clear", "Clear pinning for the selection instead of setting it");
02948 }
02949 
02950 /******************* select pinned operator ***************/
02951 
02952 static int select_pinned_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02953 {
02954     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
02955     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
02956     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
02957     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
02958     BMFace *efa;
02959     BMLoop *l;
02960     BMIter iter, liter;
02961     MTexPoly *tface;
02962     MLoopUV *luv;
02963     
02964     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
02965         tface = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
02966         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tface))
02967             continue;
02968 
02969         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
02970             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
02971             
02972             if (luv->flag & MLOOPUV_PINNED)
02973                 uvedit_uv_select_enable(em, scene, l, FALSE);
02974         }
02975     }
02976     
02977     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
02978 
02979     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02980 }
02981 
02982 static void UV_OT_select_pinned(wmOperatorType *ot)
02983 {
02984     /* identifiers */
02985     ot->name = "Selected Pinned";
02986     ot->description = "Select all pinned UV vertices";
02987     ot->idname = "UV_OT_select_pinned";
02988     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
02989     
02990     /* api callbacks */
02991     ot->exec = select_pinned_exec;
02992     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
02993 }
02994 
02995 /********************** hide operator *********************/
02996 
02997 /* check if we are selected or unselected based on 'bool_test' arg,
02998  * needed for select swap support */
02999 #define UV_SEL_TEST(luv, bool_test) ((((luv)->flag & MLOOPUV_VERTSEL) == MLOOPUV_VERTSEL) == bool_test)
03000 
03001 /* is every UV vert selected or unselected depending on bool_test */
03002 static int bm_face_is_all_uv_sel(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, int bool_test)
03003 {
03004     BMLoop *l_iter;
03005     BMLoop *l_first;
03006 
03007     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
03008     do {
03009         MLoopUV *luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l_iter->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03010         if (!UV_SEL_TEST(luv, bool_test)) {
03011             return FALSE;
03012         }
03013     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
03014 
03015     return TRUE;
03016 }
03017 
03018 static int hide_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03019 {
03020     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
03021     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
03022     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03023     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03024     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
03025     BMFace *efa;
03026     BMLoop *l;
03027     BMIter iter, liter;
03028     MLoopUV *luv;
03029     MTexPoly *tf;
03030     int swap = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "unselected");
03031     Image *ima = sima ? sima->image : NULL;
03032     int facemode = (ts->uv_selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE);
03033 
03034     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
03035         EDBM_mesh_hide(em, swap);
03036         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
03037 
03038         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03039     }
03040 
03041     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03042         int hide = 0;
03043 
03044         tf = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
03045 
03046         if (!uvedit_face_visible_test(scene, ima, efa, tf)) {
03047             continue;
03048         }
03049 
03050         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03051             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03052 
03053             if (UV_SEL_TEST(luv, !swap)) {
03054                 hide = 1;
03055                 break;
03056             }
03057         }
03058 
03059         if (hide) {
03060             /* note, a special case for edges could be used,
03061              * for now edges act like verts and get flushed */
03062             if (facemode) {
03063                 if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
03064                     /* check that every UV is selected */
03065                     if (bm_face_is_all_uv_sel(em->bm, efa, TRUE) == !swap) {
03066                         BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, FALSE);
03067                     }
03068                     uvedit_face_select_disable(scene, em, efa);
03069                 }
03070                 else {
03071                     if (bm_face_is_all_uv_sel(em->bm, efa, TRUE) == !swap) {
03072                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03073                             luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03074                             if (UV_SEL_TEST(luv, !swap)) {
03075                                 BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->v, FALSE);
03076                             }
03077                         }
03078                     }
03079                     if (!swap) uvedit_face_select_disable(scene, em, efa);
03080 
03081 
03082                 }
03083             }
03084             else if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
03085                 /* check if a UV is de-selected */
03086                 if (bm_face_is_all_uv_sel(em->bm, efa, FALSE) != !swap) {
03087                     BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, FALSE);
03088                     uvedit_face_select_disable(scene, em, efa);
03089                 }
03090             }
03091             else {
03092                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03093                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03094                     if (UV_SEL_TEST(luv, !swap)) {
03095                         BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, l->v, FALSE);
03096                         if (!swap) luv->flag &= ~MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03097                     }
03098                 }
03099             }
03100         }
03101     }
03102 
03103     /* flush vertex selection changes */
03104     if (em->selectmode != SCE_SELECT_FACE)
03105         EDBM_selectmode_flush_ex(em, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX | SCE_SELECT_EDGE);
03106     
03107     BM_select_history_validate(em->bm);
03108     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
03109 
03110     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03111 }
03112 
03113 #undef UV_SEL_TEST
03114 
03115 static void UV_OT_hide(wmOperatorType *ot)
03116 {
03117     /* identifiers */
03118     ot->name = "Hide Selected";
03119     ot->description = "Hide (un)selected UV vertices";
03120     ot->idname = "UV_OT_hide";
03121     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03122     
03123     /* api callbacks */
03124     ot->exec = hide_exec;
03125     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
03126 
03127     /* props */
03128     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "unselected", 0, "Unselected", "Hide unselected rather than selected");
03129 }
03130 
03131 /****************** reveal operator ******************/
03132 
03133 static int reveal_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03134 {
03135     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
03136     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
03137     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03138     /*Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);*/ /*UNUSED*/
03139     BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
03140     BMFace *efa;
03141     BMLoop *l;
03142     BMIter iter, liter;
03143     MLoopUV *luv;
03144     int facemode = (ts->uv_selectmode == UV_SELECT_FACE);
03145     int stickymode = sima ? (sima->sticky != SI_STICKY_DISABLE) : 1;
03146 
03147     /* note on tagging, selecting faces needs to be delayed so it doesn't select the verts and
03148      * confuse our checks on selected verts. */
03149 
03150     /* call the mesh function if we are in mesh sync sel */
03151     if (ts->uv_flag & UV_SYNC_SELECTION) {
03152         EDBM_mesh_reveal(em);
03153         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
03154 
03155         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03156     }
03157     if (facemode) {
03158         if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
03159             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03160                 BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03161                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
03162                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03163                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03164                         luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03165                     }
03166                     /* BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE); */
03167                     BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03168                 }
03169             }
03170         }
03171         else {
03172             /* enable adjacent faces to have disconnected UV selections if sticky is disabled */
03173             if (!stickymode) {
03174                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03175                     BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03176                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
03177                         int totsel = 0;
03178                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03179                             totsel += BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
03180                         }
03181                         
03182                         if (!totsel) {
03183                             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03184                                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03185                                 luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03186                             }
03187                             /* BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE); */
03188                             BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03189                         }
03190                     }
03191                 }
03192             }
03193             else {
03194                 BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03195                     BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03196                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
03197                         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03198                             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT) == 0) {
03199                                 luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03200                                 luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03201                             }
03202                         }
03203                         /* BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE); */
03204                         BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03205                     }
03206                 }
03207             }
03208         }
03209     }
03210     else if (em->selectmode == SCE_SELECT_FACE) {
03211         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03212             BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03213             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
03214                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03215                     luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03216                     luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03217                 }
03218                 /* BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE); */
03219                 BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03220             }
03221         }
03222     }
03223     else {
03224         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, em->bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03225             BM_elem_flag_disable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03226             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && !BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
03227                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03228                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(l->v, BM_ELEM_SELECT) == 0) {
03229                         luv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
03230                         luv->flag |= MLOOPUV_VERTSEL;
03231                     }
03232                 }
03233                 /* BM_face_select_set(em->bm, efa, TRUE); */
03234                 BM_elem_flag_enable(efa, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03235             }
03236         }
03237     }
03238     
03239     /* re-select tagged faces */
03240     BM_mesh_elem_hflag_enable_test(em->bm, BM_FACE, BM_ELEM_SELECT, TRUE, BM_ELEM_TAG);
03241 
03242     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
03243 
03244     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03245 }
03246 
03247 static void UV_OT_reveal(wmOperatorType *ot)
03248 {
03249     /* identifiers */
03250     ot->name = "Reveal Hidden";
03251     ot->description = "Reveal all hidden UV vertices";
03252     ot->idname = "UV_OT_reveal";
03253     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03254     
03255     /* api callbacks */
03256     ot->exec = reveal_exec;
03257     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
03258 }
03259 
03260 /******************** set 3d cursor operator ********************/
03261 
03262 static int set_2d_cursor_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03263 {
03264     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
03265     float location[2];
03266 
03267     if (!sima)
03268         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03269 
03270     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "location", location);
03271     sima->cursor[0] = location[0];
03272     sima->cursor[1] = location[1];
03273     
03274     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_IMAGE, NULL);
03275     
03276     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03277 }
03278 
03279 static int set_2d_cursor_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03280 {
03281     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03282     float location[2];
03283 
03284     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &location[0], &location[1]);
03285     RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "location", location);
03286 
03287     return set_2d_cursor_exec(C, op);
03288 }
03289 
03290 static void UV_OT_cursor_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
03291 {
03292     /* identifiers */
03293     ot->name = "Set 2D Cursor";
03294     ot->description = "Set 2D cursor location";
03295     ot->idname = "UV_OT_cursor_set";
03296     
03297     /* api callbacks */
03298     ot->exec = set_2d_cursor_exec;
03299     ot->invoke = set_2d_cursor_invoke;
03300     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
03301 
03302     /* flags */
03303     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03304 
03305     /* properties */
03306     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "location", 2, NULL, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Location", "Cursor location in normalised (0.0-1.0) coordinates", -10.0f, 10.0f);
03307 }
03308 
03309 /********************** set tile operator **********************/
03310 
03311 static int set_tile_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03312 {
03313     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
03314     int tile[2];
03315     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03316 
03317     RNA_int_get_array(op->ptr, "tile", tile);
03318 
03319     if (uvedit_set_tile(obedit, ima, tile[0] + ima->xrep * tile[1])) {
03320         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, obedit->data);
03321         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_IMAGE, NULL);
03322 
03323         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03324     }
03325     
03326     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03327 }
03328 
03329 static int set_tile_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03330 {
03331     SpaceImage *sima = CTX_wm_space_image(C);
03332     Image *ima = CTX_data_edit_image(C);
03333     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03334     float fx, fy;
03335     int tile[2];
03336 
03337     if (!ima || !(ima->tpageflag & IMA_TILES))
03338         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03339 
03340     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &fx, &fy);
03341 
03342     if (fx >= 0.0f && fy >= 0.0f && fx < 1.0f && fy < 1.0f) {
03343         fx = fx * ima->xrep;
03344         fy = fy * ima->yrep;
03345         
03346         tile[0] = fx;
03347         tile[1] = fy;
03348         
03349         sima->curtile = tile[1] * ima->xrep + tile[0];
03350         RNA_int_set_array(op->ptr, "tile", tile);
03351     }
03352 
03353     return set_tile_exec(C, op);
03354 }
03355 
03356 static void UV_OT_tile_set(wmOperatorType *ot)
03357 {
03358     /* identifiers */
03359     ot->name = "Set Tile";
03360     ot->description = "Set UV image tile coordinates";
03361     ot->idname = "UV_OT_tile_set";
03362     
03363     /* api callbacks */
03364     ot->exec = set_tile_exec;
03365     ot->invoke = set_tile_invoke;
03366     ot->poll = ED_operator_image_active; /* requires space image */;
03367 
03368     /* flags */
03369     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03370 
03371     /* properties */
03372     RNA_def_int_vector(ot->srna, "tile", 2, NULL, 0, INT_MAX, "Tile", "Tile coordinate", 0, 10);
03373 }
03374 
03375 
03376 static int seams_from_islands_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03377 {
03378     UvVertMap *vmap;
03379     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03380     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
03381     BMEditMesh *em;
03382     BMEdge *editedge;
03383     float limit[2] = {STD_UV_CONNECT_LIMIT, STD_UV_CONNECT_LIMIT};
03384     char mark_seams = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "mark_seams");
03385     char mark_sharp = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "mark_sharp");
03386 
03387     BMesh *bm;
03388     BMIter iter;
03389 
03390     em = me->edit_btmesh;
03391     bm = em->bm;
03392 
03393     if (!EDBM_mtexpoly_check(em)) {
03394         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03395     }
03396 
03397     /* This code sets editvert->tmp.l to the index. This will be useful later on. */
03398     EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 0, 0, 1);
03399     vmap = EDBM_uv_vert_map_create(em, 0, 0, limit);
03400 
03401     BM_ITER_MESH (editedge, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
03402         /* flags to determine if we uv is separated from first editface match */
03403         char separated1 = 0, separated2;
03404         /* set to denote edge must be flagged as seam */
03405         char faces_separated = 0;
03406         /* flag to keep track if uv1 is disconnected from first editface match */
03407         char v1coincident = 1;
03408         /* For use with v1coincident. v1coincident will change only if we've had commonFaces */
03409         int commonFaces = 0;
03410 
03411         BMFace *efa1, *efa2;
03412 
03413         UvMapVert *mv1, *mvinit1, *mv2, *mvinit2, *mviter;
03414         /* mv2cache stores the first of the list of coincident uv's for later comparison
03415          * mv2sep holds the last separator and is copied to mv2cache when a hit is first found */
03416         UvMapVert *mv2cache = NULL, *mv2sep = NULL;
03417 
03418         mvinit1 = vmap->vert[BM_elem_index_get(editedge->v1)];
03419         if (mark_seams)
03420             BM_elem_flag_disable(editedge, BM_ELEM_SEAM);
03421 
03422         for (mv1 = mvinit1; mv1 && !faces_separated; mv1 = mv1->next) {
03423             if (mv1->separate && commonFaces)
03424                 v1coincident = 0;
03425 
03426             separated2 = 0;
03427             efa1 = EDBM_face_at_index(em, mv1->f);
03428             mvinit2 = vmap->vert[BM_elem_index_get(editedge->v2)];
03429 
03430             for (mv2 = mvinit2; mv2; mv2 = mv2->next) {
03431                 if (mv2->separate)
03432                     mv2sep = mv2;
03433 
03434                 efa2 = EDBM_face_at_index(em, mv2->f);
03435                 if (efa1 == efa2) {
03436                     /* if v1 is not coincident no point in comparing */
03437                     if (v1coincident) {
03438                         /* have we found previously anything? */
03439                         if (mv2cache) {
03440                             /* flag seam unless proved to be coincident with previous hit */
03441                             separated2 = 1;
03442                             for (mviter = mv2cache; mviter; mviter = mviter->next) {
03443                                 if (mviter->separate && mviter != mv2cache)
03444                                     break;
03445                                 /* coincident with previous hit, do not flag seam */
03446                                 if (mviter == mv2)
03447                                     separated2 = 0;
03448                             }
03449                         }
03450                         /* First hit case, store the hit in the cache */
03451                         else {
03452                             mv2cache = mv2sep;
03453                             commonFaces = 1;
03454                         }
03455                     }
03456                     else
03457                         separated1 = 1;
03458 
03459                     if (separated1 || separated2) {
03460                         faces_separated = 1;
03461                         break;
03462                     }
03463                 }
03464             }
03465         }
03466 
03467         if (faces_separated) {
03468             if (mark_seams)
03469                 BM_elem_flag_enable(editedge, BM_ELEM_SEAM);
03470             if (mark_sharp)
03471                 BM_elem_flag_disable(editedge, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
03472         }
03473     }
03474 
03475     me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWSEAMS;
03476 
03477     EDBM_uv_vert_map_free(vmap);
03478     EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
03479 
03480     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
03481     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
03482 
03483     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03484 }
03485 
03486 
03487 static void UV_OT_seams_from_islands(wmOperatorType *ot)
03488 {
03489     /* identifiers */
03490     ot->name = "Seams From Islands";
03491     ot->description = "Set mesh seams according to island setup in the UV editor";
03492     ot->idname = "UV_OT_seams_from_islands";
03493 
03494     /* flags */
03495     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03496 
03497     /* api callbacks */
03498     ot->exec = seams_from_islands_exec;
03499     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
03500 
03501     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "mark_seams", 1, "Mark Seams", "Mark boundary edges as seams");
03502     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "mark_sharp", 0, "Mark Sharp", "Mark boundary edges as sharp");
03503 }
03504 
03505 static int mark_seam_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03506 {
03507     Object *ob = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03508     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03509     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
03510     BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
03511     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
03512     BMFace *efa;
03513     BMLoop *loop;
03514 
03515     BMIter iter, liter;
03516 
03517     BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
03518         BM_ITER_ELEM (loop, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
03519             if (uvedit_edge_select_test(em, scene, loop)) {
03520                 BM_elem_flag_enable(loop->e, BM_ELEM_SEAM);
03521             }
03522         }
03523     }
03524 
03525     me->drawflag |= ME_DRAWSEAMS;
03526 
03527     if (scene->toolsettings->edge_mode_live_unwrap)
03528         ED_unwrap_lscm(scene, ob, FALSE);
03529 
03530     DAG_id_tag_update(&me->id, 0);
03531     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, me);
03532 
03533     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03534 }
03535 
03536 static void UV_OT_mark_seam(wmOperatorType *ot)
03537 {
03538     /* identifiers */
03539     ot->name = "Mark Seams";
03540     ot->description = "Mark selected UV edges as seams";
03541     ot->idname = "UV_OT_mark_seam";
03542 
03543     /* flags */
03544     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03545 
03546     /* api callbacks */
03547     ot->exec = mark_seam_exec;
03548     ot->poll = ED_operator_uvedit;
03549 }

03601     keymap->poll = ED_operator_uvedit_can_uv_sculpt;
03602 
03603     /* Uv sculpt toggle */
03604     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_context_toggle", QKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
03605     RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "data_path", "tool_settings.use_uv_sculpt");
03606 
03607     /* Mark edge seam */
03608     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "UV_OT_mark_seam", EKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
03609

03613     RNA_boolean_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "UV_OT_select_loop", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0)->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
03614     RNA_boolean_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "UV_OT_select_loop", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT | KM_ALT, 0)->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
03615 
03616     /* border/circle selection */

03618     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "pinned", FALSE);
